name: Citizen's Crowbar
oracle_text:
When Citizen's Crowbar enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token, then attach Citizen's Crowbar to it.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has "{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Citizen's Crowbar: Destroy target artifact or enchantment."
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Whack
oracle_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a white creature.
Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

name: Deal Gone Bad
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Target player mills three cards. (They put the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"Feed the rumor mills with delicious treachery. Bad blood between those two is a good deal for us."
—Kamiz, Obscura Oculus

name: Jetmir's Fixer
oracle_text: {R}{G}: Jetmir's Fixer gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If mana from a Treasure was spent to activate this ability, put a +1/+1 counter on Jetmir's Fixer instead.
flavor_text: When you lose Jetmir's trust, his family makes sure you lose everything else.

name: Slip Out the Back
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until your next turn.)

name: "Supportive BFF"
oracle_text:
"Supportive BFF" enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
Whenever "Supportive BFF" attacks, up to one other target creature gains flying until end of turn.

name: Cabaretti Initiate
oracle_text: {2}{R/W}: Cabaretti Initiate gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Now there's a fellow who knows how to have a good time!"
—Jetmir

name: Big Score
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, draw a card.
Draw two tokens and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: "Unimaginable riches? I assure you, I have a *vivid* imagination."

name: Hold for Ransom
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block and has "{7}: Hold for Ransom's controller sacrifices it and draws a card. Activate only as a sorcery."
flavor_text:
"Let's find out how much your friends think you're worth."
—Gino, hired kidnapper

name: Plasma Jockey
oracle_text:
Whenever Plasma Jockey attacks, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.
Blitz {2}{R} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Disdainful Stroke
oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or greater.
flavor_text:
"I've known for a year that you would cast this exact spell, at this exact spot, at this exact time."
—Raffine

name: "Rosy Riveteer"
oracle_text:
Haste
"Rosy Riveteer" has indestructible as long as it entered the battlefield this turn.

name: "Rosy Riveteer"
oracle_text:
Haste
"Rosy Riveteer" has indestructible as long as it entered the battlefield this turn.

name: "First-Round Pugilist"
oracle_text:
Whenever "First-Round Pugilist" attacks, create a tapped and attacking 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
Blitz {3}{R} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: "Cleanup Crew"
oracle_text:
When "Cleanup Crew" enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
• You gain 4 life.

name: "Cement Shoes"
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +3/+3 and has "At the beginning of your end step, tap this creature."
Equipped creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Widespread Thievery
oracle_text:
Hideaway 5 (When this enchantment enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
Whenever you cast a multicored spell, create a Treasure token. Then, you may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. If you do, you may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost.

name: "Corpse Explosion"
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard.
"Corpse Explosion" deals damage equal to the exiled card's power to each creature and each planeswalker.

name: Raffine's Silencer
oracle_text:
When Raffine's Silencer enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
When Raffine's Silencer dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is Raffine's Silencer's power.

name: "Tragic Boyfriends"
oracle_text:
When "Tragic Boyfriends" dies, create a tapped 2/2 black Rogue creature token.
Blitz {3}{B} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Civil Servant
oracle_text: Whenever Civil Servant attacks, you may tap another untapped Citizen you control. If you do, Civil Servant gets +1/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Together we can build a safer, brighter New Capenna!"

name: Glittering Stockpile
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {R}. Put a stash counter on Glittering Stockpile.
{T}, Sacrifice Glittering Stockpile: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of stash counters on Glittering Stockpile.
flavor_text: The only thing Ziatora desires is "more".

name: "Butter Passer"
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control two or more multicolored creatures, "Butter Passer" gains double strike until end of turn.

name: Rogues' Gallery
oracle_text: For each color, return up to one target creature card of that color from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Between the five of them, they'd committed every crime on the books and invented a few new ones.

name: Caldaia Strongarm
oracle_text:
When Caldaia Strongarm enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
Blitz {3}{G} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Involuntary Employment
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Henzie "Toolbox" Torre
oracle_text:
Each creature you cast with mana value 4 or greater has blitz. The blitz cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may choose to cast that spell for its blitz cost. If you do it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
Blitz costs you pay cost {1} less for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game.

name: Ognis, the Dragon's Lash
oracle_text:
Haste
Whenever a creature you control with haste attacks, create a tapped Treasure token.
flavor_text: Ziatora's second-in-command has a habit of appearing when and where her enemies least expect her.

name: Ognis, the Dragon's Lash
oracle_text:
Haste
Whenever a creature you control with haste attacks, create a tapped Treasure token.

name: Celestial Regulator
oracle_text:
Flying
When Celestial Regulator enters the battlefield, choose target creature you don't control and tap it. If you control a creature with a counter on it, the chosen creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Reservoir Kraken
oracle_text:
Trample, ward {2}
At the beginning of each combat, if Reservoir Kraken is untapped, any opponent may tap an untapped creature they control. If they do, tap Reservoir Kraken and create a 1/1 blue Fish creature token with "This creature can't be blocked."

name: Mayhem Patrol
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever Mayhem Patrol attacks, target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Blitz {1}{R} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

name: Workshop Warchief
oracle_text:
Trample
When Workshop Warchief enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
When Workshop Warchief dies, create a 4/4 green Rhino Warrior creature token.
Blitz {4}{G}{G}

name: Jewel Thief
oracle_text:
Vigilance, trample
When Jewel Thief enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: "They can afford the loss. They build it into their prices."

name: Ziatora's Envoy
Ziatora's Envoy
Patch Up
oracle_text: Return up to three target creature cards with total mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Don't tell me who sent you or who you work for. The less I know, the better."

name: Boxing Ring
oracle_text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it fights up to one target creature you don't control with the same mana value.
{T}: Create a Treasure token. Activate only if you control a creature that fought this turn.

name: Mari, the Killing Quill
oracle_text:
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, exile it with a hit counter on it.
Assassins, Mercenaries, and Rogues you control have deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may remove a hit counter from a card that player owns in exile. If you do, draw a card and create two Treasure tokens."

name: Vazi, Keen Negotiator
oracle_text:
Haste
{T}: Target opponent creates X Treasure tokens, where X is the number of Treasure tokens you created this turn.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell or activates an ability, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast or activate it, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then draw a card.

name: Spiteful Repossession
oracle_text: Spiteful Repossession deals damage to each opponent who controls more lands than you equal to the difference. Then create a number of Treasure tokens equal to the damage dealt this way.
flavor_text: Late payment shall be extracted however they see fit.

name: "Broker Veteran"
oracle_text: When "Broker Veteran" dies, put a shield counter on target creature you control. (If that creature would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)

name: Riveteers Ascendancy
oracle_text: Whenever you sacrifice a creature, you may return target creature card with lesser mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Do this only once each turn.
flavor_text: "We are this city, down to its bones."

name: Riveteers Ascendancy
oracle_text: Whenever you sacrifice a creature, you may return target creature card with lesser mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Do this only once each turn.

name: Mr. Orfeo, the Boulder
oracle_text: Whenever you attack, double target creature's power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Once he was jumped by a dozen Maestros agents. You can still see their imprints in the pavement if you know where to look.

name: Mr. Orfeo, the Boulder
oracle_text: Whenever you attack, double target creature's power until end of turn.

name: Brass Knuckles
oracle_text:
When you cast this spell, copy it. (The copy becomes a token.)
Equipped creature has double strike as long as two or more Equipment are attached to it.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Scheming Fence
oracle_text:
As Scheming Fence enters the battlefield, choose a nonland permanent.
Activated abilities of the chosen permanent can't be activated.
Scheming Fence has all activated abilities of the chosen permanent except loyalty abilities. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to activate them.

name: Scheming Fence
oracle_text:
As Scheming Fence enters the battlefield, choose a nonland permanent.
Activated abilities of the chosen permanent can't be activated.
Scheming Fence has all activated abilities of the chosen permanent except loyalty abilities. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to activate them.

name: Park Heights Pegasus
oracle_text:
Flying, trample
Whenever Park Heights Pegasus deals combat damage to a player, draw a card if two or more creatures entered the battlefield under your control this turn.
